data.text:
Cameron & Jonathan drink a couple beers with the guys from Spoetzl Brewery in Shiner, TX.

Spoetzl Brewery might sound more familiar if I say Shiner Beer. This brewery in a small Texas town has created a wildly popular beer that helped put Shiner, TX on the map.

You'll learn in this episode, though, that they are also a brewery that gets creative and pushes beer boundaries, while also staying true to their core.
